Crypto Node¶

CryptoNode Class

class MMLL.nodes.CryptoNode.CryptoNode(pom, comms, logger, verbose=False, **kwargs)¶

Bases: MMLL.Common_to_all_objects.Common_to_all_objects

This class represents the main process associated to the CryptoNode, and it responds to the commands sent by the master to carry out the training procedure under POMs 4

Create a CryptoNode instance.

Parameters

  • pom (integer) – the selected POM

  • comms (comms object instance) – object providing communications

  • logger (class:logging.Logger) – logging object instance

  • verbose (boolean) – indicates if messages are print or not on screen

  • **kwargs (Arbitrary keyword arguments.) –

create_model_crypto(model_type)¶

Create the model object to be used for training at the worker side. By now only one model is available, but the list will grow and we will be able to choose here among a wide variety of options.

Parameters

model_type (str) – Type of model to be used

run()¶

Run the main execution loop at the worker
